0: Kana Sensei Tutorial (click button)
1: Today, you will embark on a journey to study Japanese scripts.
4: Go to the Quest to explore and study your chosen script.
5: Your goal is to pass the challenging Final (Exam).
6: Both Quest and Final use the tools you see here.
10: ... is your Toolbar with possibly helpful tools.
11: Inkblots are your main tool and currency to pass the Final.
12: You will get most Inkblots from gaining Levels by Experience Points.
13: Your Skill Level determines what Japanese letters you will encounter.
14: You can unlock Achievements for various kinds of activities.
15: Click on this icon to view your Achievements.
16: Tip: Get extra Inkblots by logging in daily.
19: You can also reread this tutorial here.
